pkgmetadata.longdescription: collect-system-files is a configurable script used to collect files from a user's system so that the dev-sbc/crossbuild-tools cb-mkenv and/or cb-mkimg tools can populate newly built system images with content generally found on joetoo systems, or specific to their pending-rebuild systems (such as user ssh and vpn keys) (To Do: (?) one or more board name use flag must be selectd)
